Name: E21 Coin
Description: The E21 coin will be used for Platform Utility and as a Financial Tool.Tokens intermediate transactions on decentralized networks, and their trading creates an inter-temporal complementarity among users, generating a feedback loop between token valuation and platform adoption. They capitalize future platform growth, accelerate adoption, and reduce user-base volatility. Tokens capitalizes future growth and speeds up user adoption.Surplus value created in the E21 economy would be reinvested in platforms and creators increasing the value of the ecosystem.TelegramWhitepaper
